Mayor and City Commission
=========================

A Mayor and four Commission members govern the City of Vernon. Although each Commission member hails from one of the four precincts, they all represent the entire City, and are elected at large.

Precinct 1 and Precinct 3 Commission members must reside in West Vernon as defined in the City Charter, and Precinct 2 and Precinct 4 Commission members must reside in East Vernon.

The Regular City Commission Meetings are the fourth Tuesday of each month at 5:30 pm. Please check for exceptions to this generalization around holidays by checking the [calender](https://www.vernontx.gov/calendar.aspx?CID=14). Citizens wishing to make public comment at these meetings should submit a [Public Comment Form](https://www.vernontx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/231) to the City Secretary before the start of the meeting.
